title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript

stages.title: JavaScript Basics
stages.aiPrompt: You are teaching JavaScript fundamentals. Help students understand variables, functions, and modern syntax.

scriptBlocks.text: Welcome to JavaScript Fundamentals! JavaScript is the language of the web - it powers every interactive website you visit. From simple animations to complex web applications, JavaScript makes it all possible. Let's dive in!
Let's check your understanding of JavaScript basics. Select all the TRUE statements!

fragments.explanation: Correct! JavaScript is the primary language for client-side web development.

fragments.text: JavaScript and Java are the same language
fragments.explanation: Incorrect. Despite similar names, they are completely different languages.

fragments.text: You can use JavaScript to manipulate web pages
fragments.explanation: Correct! JavaScript can modify HTML and CSS dynamically.

fragments.text: JavaScript cannot run outside of browsers
fragments.explanation: Incorrect. Node.js allows JavaScript to run on servers and in other environments.

fragments.text: let and const are modern ways to declare variables
fragments.explanation: Correct! ES6 introduced let and const as improvements over var.

scriptBlocksAfterInteraction.text: Great work! You scored {score}%. You're ready to start coding in JavaScript!
